page.title: 08Ferryhill Market
page.content: Every Friday it is very busy in Ferry- hill because of the market.It is very noisy with people shopping and stall holders shouting things like"Lovely apples only 30p a pound".As well as the noise there are also lots of smells.Some are nice smells like flowers others are not so nice like the fish or the dog food.It is also very colourful. Everyone rushes about buying fruit and vegetables,plants and flowers,toys and clothes.Some stalls have very good things. There is a lot of traffic in Ferryhill every Friday.The market starts at about 8:30 and finishes at about 4 o'clock. Annette Wilkinson(age 10)
